name: Drumming with Excitement
desc: When an opponent's monster declares a direct attack, while the combined ATK of all face-up monsters your opponent controls is 8000 or more: Special Summon 3 monsters with different original names (1 from your hand, 1 from your Deck, and 1 from your GY) in Attack Position. You can only activate 1 "Drumming with Excitement" per turn.
